title: The early films of Hans Richter = Ghosts before breakfast
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion pictures - Germany - History
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion pictures - Production and direction
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Surrealism in motion pictures
Crafts & Visual Arts/Art and motion pictures
Crafts & Visual Arts/Surrealism in motion pictures
description: This surrealist experimental film was made in 1927 by artist-painter Hans Richter. The nazis destroyed the sound version of this film and classified it as "degenerate art". The film shows everyday objects rebelling against their daily routine.
